lines.text: DUMMY
declare integers called n and m
read n and m
char * * sheet is new char * [ n ]
for integer i = 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) sheet [ i ] = new char [ m ] ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: for j = 0 to m exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < m ; j ++ ) cin >> sheet [ i ] [ j ] ;

lines.text: integers minRow = n - 1 , minCol = m - 1 , maxRow and maxCol are both 0
lines.code: int minRow = n - 1 , minCol = m - 1 , maxRow = 0 , maxCol = 0 ;

lines.text: for i = 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: for integer j = 0 to m exclusive
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < m ; j ++ )

lines.text: if sheet [ i ] [ j ] is equal to ' * '
if i is less than minRow , minRow = i
if i is greater than maxRow , maxRow = i
if j is less than minCol , minCol = j
if j is greater than maxCol , maxCol = j

for integer i = minRow to maxRow inclusive

lines.text: for j = minCol to maxCol inclusive print sheet [ i ] [ j ]

lines.text: print new line
